objects.name: Tank
objects.description: Represents the player's tank in the game with customizable attributes.
objects.special_rules: Players can only change tanks during the pick screen.
objects.source_note: Table Analysis: Parameters like 'HitPoints', 'MovementSpeed', 'Damage', etc., define the capabilities of each player's tank.

objects.name: Projectile
objects.description: Represents the ammunition fired by tanks.
objects.special_rules: Number of projectiles fired defined by ProjectileCount.
objects.source_note: Table Analysis: Attributes like 'ProjectileSpeed' and 'ProjectileCount' are part of tank-specific parameters.

systems.name: Match Configuration System
systems.description: Handles the setup and rules for different match types and game modes.
systems.mechanics: Configures match settings such as duration, player count, and scoring type based on game mode.
systems.objectives: Ensure balanced and engaging matches across different game modes.
interactions: Base Capture mode has a fixed duration of 15 minutes and supports 10 players.
Deathmatch mode allows variable durations (5–10 minutes) and supports 4–8 players.
systems.source_note: Table Analysis: The table provides structured information about how different game modes are configured in terms of match parameters.

systems.name: Player Profile System
systems.description: Manages individual player statistics and attributes during matches.
systems.mechanics: Tracks personal stats like Gold, Kill, KillStreak, and Death, as well as tank-specific attributes.
systems.objectives: Provide a detailed breakdown of user-related parameters for gameplay analysis.
interactions: Parameters like 'KillStreak' and 'ProjectileCount' reward skillful play and strategic customization.
systems.source_note: Table Analysis: Parameters like 'Gold', 'Kill', and 'KillStreak' track individual performance.

logic_rules.description: Defines the maximum duration of a match based on the selected game mode.
logic_rules.effect: Ends the match when the maximum time is reached.
logic_rules.source_note: Table Analysis: 'Maximumtime' defines the maximum duration of the game, calculated in frames (1 frame = 1 second).

logic_rules.description: Allows players to customize their tanks before the match begins.
logic_rules.effect: Players can select or modify their tank's attributes.
logic_rules.source_note: Table Analysis: Players can only change tanks during the pick screen.

requirements.title: Consistent Match Parameters
requirements.description: Ensure all game modes have consistent and clearly defined parameters.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: All match parameters must be documented and standardized across game modes.
requirements.source_note: Analysis: The table supports the surrounding content's goal of standardizing match profile design across different game modes.

requirements.title: Player Stat Tracking
requirements.description: Implement a system to track and display individual player statistics during matches.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Player stats like Gold, Kill, and KillStreak must be visible and updated in real-time.
requirements.source_note: Table Analysis: Gameplay metrics such as 'Kill', 'KillStreak', and 'Death' track individual performance.
